item.title: People from all walks of life struggle with deconstructing religious beliefs but few communities are impacted to the same degree as the 2SLGBTQIA+ community. The idea that RfR should be excluded from a pride event is a disservice to those who may need the

item.title: At Recovering from Religious our goal is to help anyone and everyone who is struggling with a loss of religious belief or is questioning their religious belief. For many, part of this struggle is being pushed out of their communities and even their famili
